title: Meditation: Light RAIN in Difficult Times (2020-05-23)
itunes:title: Meditation: Light RAIN in Difficult Times
description: Meditation: Light RAIN in Difficult Times (2020-05-23) - This meditation guides us in bringing the mindfulness and self-compassion of RAIN to a challenging part of our life, and particularly, to places of self-judgment or feelings of failure.

itunes:author: Tara Brach
